Home.text: is a sole proprietorship limited liability company. It primarily operates in the energy sector, particularly in the following areas:
Home.li1: Civil Engineering of HTB/HTA/BT electrical substations.
Home.li2: Assembly and Installation of HTB/HTA/BT overhead and underground electrical lines.
